content: papageno socks by caoua cofee materials 185 230 340 yards/170 210 310 m solid/semisolid sock yarn 22yards/20m contrasting sock yarn note if you want contrast colored cufs eels and toes you ll need about 1/3 of t e amount listed above for t ose samples dream in color smoos y and wollmeise twin needles us1/2 25mm or size to obtain gauge stitc marker croc et ook tapestry needle sizes c ild 3-5 years 6-8 years woman s-m gauge 7 5 sts= 1 increase in stockinette abbreviations cc = contrast color k = knit stitc k2tog = knit 2 toget er mc = main color p = purl stitc p2tog = purl 2 toget er rs = rig t side / public side / outside of sock sl = slip stitc as if to purl w ile leaving yarn end be ind anging on t e inside of t e sock slyb = slip stitc as if to purl wit yarn in back back = t e side away from you slyf = slip stitc as if to purl wit yarn in front front = t e side closest to you ssk = slip 1 knit wise slip 1 purl wise knit bot toget er t roug t e back loops st s = stitc es turn = turn your work so t at t e ot er side is facing you and you can start to work back on t e stitc es you ave just worked t is means - if you ave been knitting before t e turn you will be purling after t e turn w ile inside/purl-side of sock is facing you - if you ave been purling before t e turn you will be knitting after t e turn w ile outside/knit-side of sock is facing you tw = twist t e 2 strands of yarn round eac ot er to avoid oles as indicated in t e description below ws = wrong side / private side / inside of sock ©caoua cofff 2018 pattfrn is for non-commfrcial pfrsonal usf only all rights rfsfrvfd papagfno v 1 0 pagf 1/5 papageno socks - by caoua cofee please read before you start t ese socks feature an intarsia motif but unlike standard fat intarsia patterns t ey are knitted in t e round and form a tube on t e go as standard socks do to make t is appen you will work back and fort on your stitc es i e t ere are frequent turns w ere you purl back wit t e inside of t e sock facing you t an turn again to continue knitting wit outside facing but don t fear t e w ole pattern is written out stitc by stitc since i couldn t fnd a way to convincingly c art t e process t e c art is added as a visual aid only to elp you understand w at it is supposed to look like please note
